data.name: Looking for Imago
data.detailed_description:
Looking for Imago is a peaceful but yet challenging puzzle-platformer in which you will be led to tame insects & natural elements to progress in your own quest. It may also be the time to discover an atypical way to interact with the beings of this world.

In this game, you will endorse the responsibility of being a sprout carrier, one of those little beings who secretly takes care of delivering majestic tree sprouts.

‚≠ê FEATURES

  • Tame your environment to overcome its obstacles
  • Interact with insects and natural elements in an original way
  • Control your character with a simple & fine tuned control scheme
  • Build your own levels and challenge your friends

üå± WHAT'S INSIDE?

The full game is currently composed of more than 70 levels. A full-featured level editor is also unlockable at some point in the adventure. It will allow you to create your own levels & share them with your friends. Mouse & keyboard are recommended in this area.

data.short_description: Looking for Imago is a peaceful but yet challenging puzzle-platformer in which you will be led to tame insects & natural elements to progress in your quest. Get ready to discover an original way to interact with the critters of this world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
